General.Name: Sin Heng Chan (Malaya) Bhd
General.Description: Sin Heng Chan (Malaya) Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the cultivation of oil palm plantations in Malaysia. The company operates through Plantation, and Energy and Facilities Management segments. It owns a contiguous landbank of 10,940 hectares of mineral soil in Sarawak. The company also engages in the engineering, procurement, and construction of district cooling systems; supply of cooling energy from district cooling systems and related activities; provision of project, energy, and facility management services; supply of chilled water to designated buildings and shared facilities; and sale of fresh fruit bunches. Sin Heng Chan (Malaya) Berhad was incorporated in 1962 is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
